title: Sadness, Depression and Dreams of Cubes
itunes:title: Sadness, Depression and Dreams of Cubes
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Just a little dream...

***

Written by Rene Rehn and narrated by: Danielle Hewitt

***

Bonus Episode: "I rode an elevator to the thirteenth floor" written by Jared Medrano

***

Find our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Sound Design by Pacific Obadiah

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
